                        throws InvalidMapException

      • validateContinent

        public static void validateContinent(Continent continent,
                                     Model model)
                              throws InvalidMapException
        Validate continet. It should have at least one country.
        参数:
        continent - continent object
        model - model object
        抛出:
        InvalidMapException - invalid map exception

      • continentIsASubGraph

                                           Model model)
        Check if graph is a connected graph.
        参数:
        continent - continent object
        model - model object
        返回:
        boolean true or false

      • validateCountry

        public static void validateCountry(Country country,
                                   Model model)
                            throws InvalidMapException
        Check if the country is a valid country. It should has at least one adjacent neighbor country
        参数:
        country - country object
        model - model object
        抛出:
        InvalidMapException - invalid map exception

      • isCountryAConnectedGraph

        public static boolean isCountryAConnectedGraph(Country country)
        Check whether a country forms a connected graph or not.
        参数:
        country - country object
        返回:
        boolean isCountry a connected graph
